title: Executive Order 6664-Waiver of Civil-Service Rule IX to Permit the Reinstatement of Miss Irene C. Claveloux in the General Accounting Office
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the provisions of the last sentence of the eighth paragraph of subdivision second of section 2 of the Civil Service Act of January 16, 1883 (ch. 27, 22 Stat. 403, 404), it is hereby ordered that the time limit prescribed by civil-service rule IX be waived to permit the reinstatement of Miss Irene C. Claveloux to a position in the General Accounting Office.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6664-Waiver of Civil-Service Rule IX to Permit the Reinstatement of Miss Irene C. Claveloux in the General Accounting Office Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362430
